languages.text: {n}Трубовед пытается почтительно горбиться, что выглядит потешно, учитывая его внушительные рост и комплекцию. Теребя косматую бороду, он склоняет голову.{/n} "Я старший трубовед Гведон. Служу покорно, Лорд-капитан, готов сознаться во всем".

{n}The pipewarden does his best to remain reverentially bowed, which paints a rather comical picture given his formidable height and complexion. He lowers his head, tugging at his beard.{/n} "Senior pipewarden Gwedon, honoured to serve, Lord Captain. I'm ready to confess to everything."
languages.original_text: {n}Трубовед пытается почтительно горбиться, что выглядит потешно, учитывая его внушительные рост и комплекцию. Теребя косматую бороду, он склоняет голову.{/n} "Я старший трубовед Гведон. Служу покорно, Лорд-капитан, готов сознаться во всем".

traits.locale_text: {n}The pipewarden does his best to remain reverentially bowed, which paints a rather comical picture given his formidable height and complexion. He lowers his head, tugging at his beard.{/n} "Senior pipewarden Gwedon, honoured to serve, Lord Captain. I'm ready to confess to everything."
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

He lowers his head, tugging at his beard.{/n} "Senior pipewarden Gwedon, honoured to serve, Lord Captain. I'm ready to confess to everything."

traits.locale_text: {n}The pipewarden does his best to remain reverentially bowed, which paints a rather comical picture given his formidable height and complexion. He lowers his head, tugging at his beard.{/n} "Senior pipewarden Gwedon, at Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s service. It's a great honour, Lord Captain. I'm ready to confess to everything."
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

He lowers his head, tugging at his beard.{/n} "Senior pipewarden Gwedon, honoured to serve, Lord Captain. I'm ready to confess to everything."

languages.text: {n}Malgré sa stature et son apparence imposante, l'égoutier fait tant d'efforts pour rester penché en signe de soumission que c'en est presque comique. Tête basse, il se triture nerveusement la barbe.{/n} « Égoutier supérieur Gwedon pour vous servir. C'est un grand honneur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je suis prêt à tout vous dire. »
languages.original_text: {n}The pipewarden does his best to remain reverentially bowed, which paints a rather comical picture given his formidable height and complexion. He lowers his head, tugging at his beard.{/n} "Senior pipewarden Gwedon, honoured to serve, Lord Captain. I'm ready to confess to everything."

Je suis prêt à tout vous dire. »

Tête basse, il se triture nerveusement la barbe.{/n} « Égoutier supérieur Gwedon pour vous servir. C'est un grand honneur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je suis prêt à tout vous dire. »
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

languages.text: {n}El inspector de tuberías hace lo posible por mantener una reverencia respetuosa, lo que, con su impresionante altura y complexión, le da un aspecto cómico. Agacha la cabeza y se mesa la barba.{/n} «Inspector veterano de tuberías Gwedon. Es un honor servirle, Lord Capitán. Estoy listo para confesarlo todo».
languages.original_text: {n}The pipewarden does his best to remain reverentially bowed, which paints a rather comical picture given his formidable height and complexion. He lowers his head, tugging at his beard.{/n} "Senior pipewarden Gwedon, honoured to serve, Lord Captain. I'm ready to confess to everything."

Agacha la cabeza y se mesa la barba.{/n} «Inspector veterano de tuberías Gwedon. Es un honor servirle, Lord Capitán. Estoy listo para confesarlo todo».

traits.locale_text: {n}El inspector de tuberías hace lo posible por mantener una reverencia respetuosa, lo que, con su impresionante altura y complexión, le da un aspecto cómico. Agacha la cabeza y se mesa la barba.{/n} «Inspector veterano de tuberías Gwedon, al servicio de mi{mf|lord|lady}. Es un gran honor, Lord Capitán. Estoy listo para confesarlo todo».
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

languages.text: {n}管道员尽可能保持着恭敬的态度，向你鞠躬。鉴于他令人生畏的身高与相貌，这一幕看起来相当滑稽。他低下了头，抿着胡子。{/n}“高阶管道员戈登听候差遣，舰长大人。我已经准备好坦白真相了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The pipewarden does his best to remain reverentially bowed, which paints a rather comical picture given his formidable height and complexion. He lowers his head, tugging at his beard.{/n} "Senior pipewarden Gwedon, honoured to serve, Lord Captain. I'm ready to confess to everything."

traits.locale_text: {n}管道员尽可能保持着恭敬的态度，向你鞠躬。鉴于他令人生畏的身高与相貌，这一幕看起来相当滑稽。他低下了头，抿着胡子。{/n}“高阶管道员戈登听候差遣，舰长大人。我已经准备好坦白真相了。”
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

traits.locale_text: {n}管道员尽可能保持着恭敬的态度，向你鞠躬。鉴于他令人生畏的身高与相貌，这一幕看起来相当滑稽。他低下了头，抿着胡子。{/n}“高阶管道员戈登，听候大人您差遣。这是我的荣幸，舰长大人，我已经准备好坦白所有真相了。”
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

languages.text: {n}パイプ監視員は精一杯お辞儀をしたが、その身長と顔色でのお辞儀はかなりコミカルな絵面になっていた。彼は頭を下げ、髭を引っ張った。{/n}「上級パイプ監視員のグウェドンでございます。仕えることを光栄に思います、ロード・キャプテン。ここで全てを白状いたします」
languages.original_text: {n}The pipewarden does his best to remain reverentially bowed, which paints a rather comical picture given his formidable height and complexion. He lowers his head, tugging at his beard.{/n} "Senior pipewarden Gwedon, honoured to serve, Lord Captain. I'm ready to confess to everything."

traits.locale_text: {n}パイプ監視員は精一杯お辞儀をしたが、その身長と顔色でのお辞儀はかなりコミカルな絵面になっていた。彼は頭を下げ、髭を引っ張った。{/n}「上級パイプ監視員のグウェドンでございます。仕えることを光栄に思います、ロード・キャプテン。ここで全てを白状いたします」
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

traits.locale_text: {n}パイプ監視員は精一杯お辞儀をしたが、その身長と顔色でのお辞儀はかなりコミカルな絵面になっていた。彼は頭を下げ、髭を引っ張った。{/n}「上級パイプ監視員のグウェドンでございます。あなたにお会いできて大変光栄です、ロード・キャプテン。ここで全てを白状いたします」
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

languages.text: {n}Der Rohrhüter bemüht sich nach Kräften, ehrfürchtig verneigt zu bleiben, was angesichts seiner formidablen Größe und seiner Hautfarbe ein recht komisches Bild abgibt. Er senkt den Kopf und zupft an seinem Bart.{/n} "Leitender Rohrhüter Gwedon, zu Euren Diensten, Lord Captain. Ich bin bereit, alles zu gestehen."
languages.original_text: {n}The pipewarden does his best to remain reverentially bowed, which paints a rather comical picture given his formidable height and complexion. He lowers his head, tugging at his beard.{/n} "Senior pipewarden Gwedon, honoured to serve, Lord Captain. I'm ready to confess to everything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Rohrhüter bemüht sich nach Kräften, ehrfürchtig verneigt zu bleiben, was angesichts seiner formidablen Größe und seiner Hautfarbe ein recht komisches Bild abgibt. Er senkt den Kopf und zupft an seinem Bart.{/n} "Leitender Rohrhüter Gwedon, zu Euren Diensten, Lord Captain. Ich bin bereit, alles zu gestehen."
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Rohrhüter bemüht sich nach Kräften, ehrfürchtig verneigt zu bleiben, was angesichts seiner formidablen Größe und seiner Hautfarbe ein recht komisches Bild abgibt. Er senkt den Kopf und zupft an seinem Bart.{/n} "Leitender Rohrhüter Gwedon, zu Euren Diensten, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es ist mir eine große Ehre, Lord Captain. Ich bin bereit, alles zu gestehen."
traits.speaker: TrueGvedon
